short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show jira cloud quickfilters in both variants - less filters and much filters

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When you use Atlassian Jira Cloud services the Quickfilters only shows after click on the Quick filters button. Also the layout is different and depends on the count of your configured filters.

With this plugin you are able to always show the Quickfilters below the Quick filters button in the same layout, never mind how many filters you have configured.
